text: S: Enrolled to Governor.
S: Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 821).
H: Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 888).

H: Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with Representative(s) Belatti, Iwamoto, Perruso, Souza voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Alcos, Garcia, Matsumoto, Muraoka, Pierick voting no (5) and Representative(s) Cochran excused (1).
S: Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1).  Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 2 (Senator(s) Awa, DeCorte).  Excused, 0 (none).
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday, 04-30-25.
H: Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 127) as amended in (CD 1).
S: 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-25.
S: Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 127).

H: The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Holt, Alcos; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

S: The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hashimoto, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Aquino.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-25-25 10:30AM in conference room 309.
H: Received notice of change in Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 867).
S: Senate Conferees Changed: Senator Kanuha discharged as Conferee. Senator Aquino added as Conferee.
H: Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Wednesday, 04-23-25 10:30AM in conference room 309.
H: Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 789).
S: Senate Conferees Appointed: Hashimoto Chair; Kanuha, Fevella.
S: Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 731).
H: House Conferees Appointed: Yamashita Chair; Holt, Alcos.
H: Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 779).
S: Senate disagrees with House amendments.
S: Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 662).
H: Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Garcia, Muraoka voting no (2) and Representative(s) Cochran excused (1).  Transmitted to Senate.
H: Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Kapela excused (2).
H: Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1945) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.

H: The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Holt, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Kitagawa, Kusch, Lamosao, Lee, M., Miyake, Morikawa, Templo, Reyes Oda; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Hussey, Alcos, Ward.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 03-27-25 2:00PM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Referred to FIN, referral sheet 19
H: Pass First Reading
H: Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 220) in amended form (SD 2).
S: Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none .  Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice 03-04-25.
S: Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 2).
S: Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 822) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 2) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.

S: The committee(s) on  WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, DeCoite, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, C., Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on WAM has scheduled a public hearing on 02-26-25 10:02AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
S: Report adopted, as amended (SD 1) and recommitted to WAM.
S: Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 548) as amended (SD 1), with recommendation of recommittal to WAM.

S: The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS and be recommitted.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, DeCoite, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, C., Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-12-25 10:02AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
S: Referred to WAM.
S: Passed First Reading.
S: Introduced.
